class_notes: Contact Sorin Huh for permission to enroll. sorin.huh@emory.edu
course_description: This course is designed for those who have learned the basics of the Korean language and who want to improve their competence at a higher level. Complex sentences and grammar will be covered while the basics are reviewed.
